sqlMap.insert:
SELECT MALL.MALL_SEQ_ADVERT_STATS.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MALL.MALL_TB_ADVERT_STATS ( ID, ADVERT_ID, USER_ID, IP, STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #id#, #advertId#, #userId#, #ip#, 'U', TO_DATE(#createDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate, #modifyUser# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(t.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS dates, COUNT(1) AS pv , COUNT(DISTINCT t.ip) AS uv FROM MALL.MALL_TB_ADVERT_STATS t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.advert_id = #advertId# AND t.create_date >= to_date(#gmtStart#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.create_date < to_date(#gmtEnd#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(t.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY dates ASC
